product_overview: Bingola is a modern, interactive social bingo platform built as a Progressive Web App (PWA) to enable real-time synchronized multiplayer bingo games with rich social features, virtual economy, and engaging user experience across mobile and desktop devices.
core_goals: Provide synchronous multiplayer bingo experience with real-time game state synchronization.
Enable hosts to create and manage bingo game rooms with configurable settings.
Integrate comprehensive social features including chat, friends, invitations, and global rankings.
Implement a virtual economy using BPoints and BCoins for in-game purchases and rewards.
Deliver a responsive, accessible, and fast-loading application with engaging UI and animations.
key_features: User authentication with login, registration, and password recovery via Supabase Auth.
User profile management including avatar upload, level, BPoints, BCoins tracking, and statistics display.
Interactive tutorial guiding new users through game mechanics.
Host room creation with customizable settings for prize type and draw intervals.
Player room entry via room code or invitation with real-time synchronization of game state and player status.
Dynamic bingo card generation with manual or assisted marking capabilities.
Real-time draw management controlled by hosts with celebration animations and sound effects for winners.
Global and room-specific chat with support for quick messages and emojis.
Central messaging system for friend notifications and system alerts.
Friends system for quick invitations and social interactions.
Global rankings showcasing player competition based on BPoints.
In-game store for purchasing cosmetic items and boosters using BCoins with transaction logging.
Interface customization options including themes, fonts, and colors.
Administrative master hub panel for economic and subscription controls.
Automatic user logout after inactivity to optimize resource usage.
Security enforced via Supabase RLS policies ensuring authorized data access only.
user_flow_summary: Participant Flow: SplashScreen → Login/Register → HomeScreen (choose room) → ParticipantLobby (wait for host) → GameScreen (mark numbers) → Victory (acknowledgment with celebrations and rewards).
Host Flow: HomeScreen → HostDashboard → Create/manage room with prize and rules → LobbyScreen (manage player entry) → GameScreen (control draw pace with Play/Pause).
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication flows including login, registration, and password recovery.
Real-time synchronization of game draws, player statuses, and room states with no noticeable latency.
Correctly functioning dynamic card generation and marking features.
Robust chat and messaging systems supporting instant communication and notifications.
Accurate tracking of user assets and virtual currencies with proper transaction logging.
Store operations must correctly process purchases and update user assets.
Host controls must reliably manage game room states and player management.
User interface must be responsive and accessible across different device types.
Security measures must enforce RLS policies and prevent unauthorized data access.
Auto-logout functionality triggers after specified inactivity period.
Consistent performance with quick load times and smooth animations.
